### Question 1
```{ojs}
//| echo: false
rand_skew_no = Math.round(Math.random() * 400)/100;
```
Is a skewness z-score of ${rand_skew_no} indicative of a significant problem of skewness?

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
viewof question_1_response = Inputs.radio(["Yes", "No"], {label: "", value: "A"});
this_result = { 
  var question_1_result = "awaiting response";

  if(rand_skew_no > 1.96){
    if(question_1_response == "Yes"){
      question_1_result = "Correct - Z scores above 1.96 suggest significant problems with skewness";
    } else if(question_1_response == "No") {
      question_1_result = "Not Correct - Z scores above 1.96 suggest significant problems with skewness";
    }
  } else {
    if(question_1_response == "Yes"){
      question_1_result = "Not Correct - Z scores below 1.96 **do not** suggest significant problems with skewness";
    } else if(question_1_response == "No") {
      question_1_result = "Correct  - Z scores below 1.96 **do not** suggest significant problems with skewness";
    }
  }
  return question_1_result;
}

```
Your answer is **${this_result}**
